ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers triple sec liqueur
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger fresh lime juice
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger bottled lime juice
des: "This is a citrus drink, great for all you lime lovers out there. It is our favorite."
ins: In a cocktail shaker full of ice combine vodka, triple sec, fresh lime juice and bottled lime juice. Shake, don't stir and strain into a chilled glass.
